channel.title: How to have your server online?
channel.description: I need step by step how to make my noobscape v3 online so other people can connect using the client ? Anyone wanna get me some info that works. I'm running windows vista if that helps any at all.

item.title: How to have your server online?
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:2, topic:549117”]ipconfig/all -> ipv4 in server.java? -> Ip Address in the client -> Open Firewall/Portforward -> Online
Something like that, I can’t remember.[/quote]

System32 man…

Read full topic
item.source: How to have your server online?
